levels.description:
ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>; Releases Drone to attack enemies
<$ba.overdrive>Overload</>: Trait Max drone damage increased to <@ba.vup>{scale}</>x, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>; When the skill ends, <$ba.stun>Stunned</> for the same duration as the Overload
<@ba.rem>The Drone locks onto an enemy until the enemy is defeated or until the skill is over, then returns to the Operator. Can manually deactivate skill at will.</>
